divs: Sighting DetailsI just got up at 5:11 to go to work and i went to make a cup of coffe when i remembered that i left my coffe cup in the car cup holder when i saw above a small tree and i saw it twice as big as a semi-truck with blue lights at the bottom i got so scared i ran inside and never told any one i live alone.I noticed it by a storng force of air or wind.It stayed there for ten hole seconds then a churning sound started and it went bright red then a flash of light and it was gone.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around June 6th 2006
Summary: staying in place then flying fast to the hills
Object Shape: Boomerang, Bullet, Missile, Circle, Disc, Flash, Unknown
